body.p: As explained in paragraph 2.12, the 2018 Conceptual Framework explicitly states that, to provide a faithful representation of an economic phenomenon, an entity should report the substance of that phenomenon. The 2018 Conceptual Framework includes concepts for reporting the substance of contractual rights and contractual obligations. Those concepts drew on concepts developed by the Board in standard-setting projects. The Board decided that including the underlying concepts in the 2018 Conceptual Framework would help to ensure that these concepts are applied more consistently in Standards.
